|  --- | --- |

|  [syncCerts(certs, server, opts)](./update-certs.synccerts.md) | Synchronize certificates with a TLS server. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DEFAULT\_DEBOUNCE\_MS](./update-certs.default_debounce_ms.md) | <p>Default debounce time in ms.</p><p>If multiple filesystem events are occured during this time only one callback will be called with the final value.</p> |
|  [DEFAULT\_TIMEOUT\_MS](./update-certs.default_timeout_ms.md) | <p>Default timeout in ms.</p><p>Represents overall timeout. If all the files are not loaded within this time frame, callback will be called with an Error as th first argument.</p> |
